question: What was your tutor's name?
guidance: If your tutor isn't listed yet, just enter their full name and you'll be able to add them as an option.

question: Did your tutor provide written feedback on your work?
options: 💬 Yes - I got comments on specific sections
📝 Yes - I got an overall comment for the whole submission
🔢 Yes - I got a grade / numerical mark
guidance: If someone else marked your work, please select the option that best describes the feedback you received, and then note this in the comments section.

question: Did your tutor provide verbal feedback on your work?
In general, had your tutor looked at your work before the tutorial?
Overall, how useful did you find the feedback you received?
If you asked your tutor a specific, subject-related question, how helpful would their answer usually be?
Overall, how useful did you find the tutorials?
How was your tutor at returning work to you?
guidance: Again, if someone else marked your work, please select the option that best describes the feedback you received, and then note this in the comments section.

question: How long was a typical tutorial?
Did you usually spend your tutorials discussing...
options: ✏️ your answers to the essay/problem sheet
➰ a mix of your answers and readings

question: Any additional comments?
guidance: For example: whether you had classes rather than tutorials; which essay topics the tutor set; whether somebody other than your tutor marked your work; extra details if you were taking a special subject.
